name: Chicken Kitchen
description:
Cook incredible meals as a literal butter chicken in Chicken Kitchen!  Push ingredients into the correct spot to complete the meal -- but watch out!  As you're in a pan, and made of butter, you leave a slippery butter trail behind yourself, making it very difficult to backtrack.  And yes, all the puzzles are possible. 

Controls: arrow keys to move around, r to restart, esc to pause, and arrow keys and enter or clicking for UI buttons.

Made in 5 days for the Jame Gam 25 with theme "Unintended Side Effect" and special object "Butter Chicken" -- our game has a vegetarian spin on the special object.

Calliope - lead programmer and level designer

Scutoid - lead artist and composer, also did programming and level designing
